name: Super Scrimblo (beta 2)
description:
!!! Web build is not recommended for the best experience, but rather a "quick and easy" option to enjoy Super Scrimblo! Please look into downloading a standalone build for the full experience !!!

Super Scrimblo - beta milestone 2, publicized on November 21st
This game is a work in progress, the game does not save!

Controls
ARROW KEYS - MOVE
UP ARROW - INTERACT
Z - JUMP
X - TAUNT

Credits
Programming and Direction 
     S.D.

Music
     Coffee "Valen" Bat (here)

Promotional Art

     Sinclair (here)

Special thanks to Emilio for Dialogic!
Created (lovingly) using Godot <3
